132121221111122221212.title: new perminent home.

132121222.content:
Chris wasnt happy with his fate. No, Chris was unhappy about his fate. NO. Chris was pretty angry about his fate. NO!!!! CHRIS WAS SO STEAMING HOT WITH FURY, HE'D PROBABLY MELT HIMSELF DOWN BEFORE REISEN'S DIGESTIVE ACIDS DO! Sure he didnt wanna be digested, but he didnt take too kindly to Reisen threatening with him either. So against his better judgement, he flipped.

"Be good? Be good?! BE GOOD?!! BE...urggh..." Chris stomped as he fumed, "he just swallowed me alive and youre keeping me in your stomach against my will! Youre telling me to be good?! Just let me outta here, you crazy bunny-eared lunatic! Let me out NOW!!"

That demand worked as well as anything who isnt dumber than a sacker of hammers knew it would. The colossal bunny girl did not take too kindly to being called a lunatic. She was trying to be nice and this tiny jerk in her belly had the nerve to call her a lunatic? To her that was a low blow. NO ONE calls her a lunatic and gets away with it!

She was so angry, she was so steaming mad, she was clenching her fists, raising her shoulders, and shivering with fury. The shivering was like an earthquake to Chris. He was awful quick to regret that rather rude statement he made. But at this point it was too late to apologize. With no other option available for him, he could only hope that at his size, the digestion would be quick and painless.

Thankfully for him, Reisen, despite being p'oed for being called a 'lunatic' didnt have the heart to kill the poor little guy. She wasnt a heartless monster. She could never live with herself if she had digested an innocent person just because he made her mad. Besides, she had a much better AND more humane way of getting revenge.
She closed her eyes and concentrated.

Chris, realizing he had still not been digested long after the earth stopped moving, breathed a sigh of relief. Unfortunately it was premature, cuz shortly after the sigh left his lips, the organic cavern around him began to rapidly flash multiple psychadelic colors. After flashing several colors, Chris found himself staring unblinkingly at a pair of bright glowing red eyes in the middle of the psychadelic flash

He found himself completely unable to look away from the eyes.
“You dont want to leave my stomach,” Reisen's voice echoes throughout the chamber while Chris is lost in a trance.
“I… dont want to leave your stomach,” Chris responds in his trance.
“You love it here inside me,” Reisen continues.
“I love it here inside you,” Chris obediently repeats.
“Youre happy to be eaten by me,” her voice resonates from the chamber of her belly right into the deepest corner of Chris's mind.
“I'm happy to be eaten by you, Reisen,” and just like that, Chris just stopped being mad at that colossal bunny ear who swallowed him for the silliest of reasons! By the time the eyes and the psychadelicness vanished, he had a whole new perspective.

He didnt hate being stuck inside this vast ghastly organic chamber! He loved being all nice and snug inside this beautiful wet squishy minimally lit up cavern of mysteries that was Reisen's tummy! It was warm, cozy, roomy, offered free food that dropped from the ceiling, extremely unlikely to experience a break-in robbery, and best of all, it was located deep within the confines of such a lovely colossal bunny girl.

No, bunny GODDESS was more like it! It was truly a tremendous honor to be gulped down by a gorgeous bunny-eared deity like her. He was very lucky too. Rabbits are primarily vegetarians, so it's quite a rare feat that she'd devour a living creature, let alone without chewing him up or digesting him. How he managed to be shrunken down at the right place at the right time when Reisen decided she wanted a tiny person in her belly was a miracle!

Chris became SO grateful of his fate, he literally fell to the floor and kissed the wet slimy ground he was walking on! He relished the taste of the stomach juice as he kissed the floor of his newbound Heaven over and over.
Finally hearing and feeling the inhabitant in her belly calm down, Reisen smiled with glee. Score one for the 'lunatic'. Hopefully, being an obedient worshiper of this lunatic will teach him some manners. She probably shouldnt use hypnosis on him too much, though. Eirin wont forgive her if she ended up giving her tiny patient permanent brain damage. Nah, just a little brain-washed worship should be enough for him. Hopefully, she'll be feeling him dancing in joy inside her really soon. In the meantime, there's a medicine closet that needs resorting.

Back inside the bunny girl, Chris seemed to having the time of his life worshiping every inch of the vast dark chamber he was trapped in. He'd erect a statue of the bunny girl in honor of his host but he was kinda lacking supplies. He hoped she wouldnt be offended by that show of inconsideration.
As he mused on the proper way to pay his bunny-giantess mistress tribute, he spouted what looked to be a small tight opening on the wall which would no doubt lead to the next chamber of Reisen's digestive system. The thought of exploring more of the deep mysterious reaches within the bunny giantess thrilled him with excitement. Considering the average length of the small intestine, he'd have plenty of mysterious reaches to explore and worship!

He approached the opening, ready to journey further... until something held him back. Reisen only mentioned that she wanted him in her stomach. She never mentioned any other part of her. What if she finds out he went where he wasnt supposed to and she gets mad? She might never let him inside her again!
...Uh... and something about threatening his very life if he wasnt careful, but that just wasnt processing very well in Chris's head. Eh, it probably wasnt important.

Should he press his luck and venture through that opening? Or should he play it safe and not risk his colossal captor's wrath again?
132121222.title: The Proper Mindset

1321212222.content:
Chris had thought over him that if he ventured further Reisen would hate him, so he decided not to venture as the entrance closed. Back outside, Reisen finished doing some business then eirin came in with troubled face.

“Don’t worry, I’ll protect you from dangers, and I’ll give you food and water through my esophagus.” Reisen said.
